newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Autodesk rating cut to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Autodesk rating cut to hold.

text.p: -- Hanifen Imhoff Inc said Wednesday it lowered its rating for Autodesk Inc to hold from buy based on the recent appreciation of the company's stock price.

-- The current valuation reflects a multiple of roughly 25 times Hanifen's earnings estimates for fiscal 1998, which is consistent with projections for long-term earnings growth of between 20 and 25 percent, Hanifen said.
-- The recent strength in the stock can be completely attributed to the anticipated release of AutoCAD 14, a graphics software program, Hanifen said.
-- Autodesk is a software development company.
-- Its shares were unchanged Wednesday at 36-1/8.
